scripts.build: echo "No build needed - TypeScript files consumed directly"
scripts.gencode: nswag openapi2tsclient /input:http://localhost:__HttpPort__/swagger/v1/swagger.json /output:client.ts /NullValue:Null /MarkOptionalProperties:false /Template:Fetch /TypeStyle:Interface /DateTimeType:string /TypeScriptVersion:4.9 && curl http://localhost:__HttpPort__/api/CodeGen/Schemas > schemas.ts && curl http://localhost:__HttpPort__/api/CodeGen/Forms > formdefs.ts && prettier -w client.ts schemas.ts formdefs.ts
